overview: Richard Aldana has hit rock bottom. The nine years since Season 1 have left him amongst the ruins of a disastrous marriage to Tomie Katana, a failed boxing career and mountains of debt.  He spends his time, cigarette and whiskey in hand, brooding over Howard's betrayal and the loss of his friends, Cheeky, Dave, Siri.  When he witnesses the terrible accident of his former ring mate Duke Diamonds, he agrees to get back in the ring to pay for his operation...
title: Lastman Heroes
